item.title: "While its future faced many obstacles in 2020, the...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"While its future faced many obstacles in 2020, the Tattered Cover Bookstore‚Äîwhich is under new ownership after it was sold in December‚Äîis working to reinvigorate its image with an initiative that resurrects a piece of Denver‚Äôs past."

5280 Magazine

Tattered Cover partners with Clara Villarosa, founder of Hue-Man Experience, to launch a consulting initiative within the indie bookstore.

item.title: "City leaders in Aurora announced on Friday they expect to...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"City leaders in Aurora announced on Friday they expect to publicly release the results of an independent investigation into the death of Elijah McClain on Monday morning. The investigation is expected to be completed and delivered to them in the morning and then it will be made public immediately afterward."

CBS Denver

item.title: "The movement for Black lives has been happening for...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"The movement for Black lives has been happening for generations. It didn‚Äôt just pop up this summer and it‚Äôs not something that ended this past summer either. We will continue to fight for change, but we want to make sure that change is implemented in a way that is just and fair." - State Representative Leslie Herod

Denver7

The Civil Rights Movement of the 1960s often takes center stage when the nation reflects on the fight for equality in America. But in Colorado, civil rights victories came nearly 100 years before that 1960s movement.

thedenverchannel.com

Black Coloradans' fight for civil rights began a century before the national movement

The Civil Rights Movement of the 1960s often takes center stage when the nation reflects on the fight for equality in America. But in Colorado, civil rights victories came nearly 100 years before that 1960s movement.The Civil Rights Movement of the 1960s often takes center stage when the nation reflects on the fight for equality in America. But in Colorado, civil rights victories came nearly 100 years before that 1960s movement.

item.title: "What we're seeing about the use of ketamine in the...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"What we're seeing about the use of ketamine in the field is that they are not utilizing the appropriate medical protocols before administering the drug and that is why we're seeing the adverse effects and that is what needs to stop." - State Representative Leslie Herod

Rep. Leslie Herod‚Äôs bill is a response to the death of Elijah McClain and comes after KUNC revealed more than 900 ketamine sedations for excited or agitated people around the state in 2.5 years.

kunc.org

item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"In about a week, a Coloradan was able to use his computer skills for the greater good by creating a tool to help everyone find COVID-19 vaccine appointments across the state."

After hearing frustrations from colleagues, Nick Muerdter, a computer programmer, decided to create a website to help Coloradans locate vaccine appointments across the state.

item.title: "Among the most important pieces of that new policy is a...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Among the most important pieces of that new policy is a non-binding goal that 35 percent of all housing units built on RTD property be affordable. The new policy would also give RTD staff more flexibility to allow housing developments that don‚Äôt include a garage to replace every parking spot they use."

Colorado Public Radio

The RTD board will soon vote on a new policy designed to encourage more housing to be built on the agency‚Äôs property near its stations ‚Äî mostly park and rides ‚Äî across metro Denver.

item.title: Incredibly humbled by this feature in 5280 and honored to have...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

Incredibly humbled by this feature in 5280 and honored to have community support for this work. We all have a story to tell. Our stories are our strength and our voices will be heard.
